entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (corellia_38_ubbal_fenn.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_10: I was serious. If you wanna become a Meatlump, just let me know. You get to destroy lots of stuff, like droids and vehicles and terminals.
entries.s_32: You make good destruction. Wanna be a Meatlump?
entries.s_34: You shouldn't be here. I strongly suggest you leave. Now.
entries.s_43: No. Wanna tell me why you attacked that starship captain?
entries.s_44: Yeah, whatever. He transports electronics into and out of the system. He shouldn't do that. Our king says that electronics are the source of evil in the world and must be purged. Only simple machines and combustion engines are acceptable.
